images.name: Campaign Title Image
images.description: This is the image that appears on the title page. No direct gameplay content

images.name: Outside of the Hut
images.description: A small, moss-covered wooden hut sits in a clearing amidst the dense forest. Its roof is overgrown with vines, and the door hangs ajar. Various herbs and plants are scattered haphazardly around the hut, and a long-neglected garden of mysterious plants thrives in the wild outside.

images.name: Morrowsend Market
images.description: A vibrant day in Morrowsend's bustling marketplace, where merchants display their wares and buskers entertain the crowd with enchanting tunes. A testament to the lively spirit of the townsfolk.

images.name: Morrowsend Town Hall
images.description: Morrowsend's grand town hall, adorned with intricate carvings and bathed in the golden glow of the setting sun. A symbol of governance and unity in the heart of the town.

images.name: Weeping Willow Tavern
images.description: A cozy evening at The Weeping Willow Tavern, where patrons gather to share stories, laughter, and camaraderie over hearty meals and refreshing drinks. A warm refuge in the quaint town of Morrowsend.

images.name: Narell
images.description: Narell is the wise village elder with long silver hair adorned with a wreath of forest flowers. She wears an elegant robe embroidered with mystical symbols and carries an ancient tome.

images.name: Bromir
images.description: Bromir is a seasoned adventurer and mentor with a grizzled beard and battle scars. He wears sturdy leather armor and carries a well-used greatsword on his back.

images.name: Aria
images.description: Aria is a skilled archer and member of the elusive Moonshadow Elves. She is secretive and loyal, with a graceful demeanor.

images.name: Thane
images.description: Thane is a cunning rogue with a charming and mischievous demeanor. He wears dark, well-fitted clothing and carries various tools of his trade.

images.name: Lycia
images.description: Lycia is an intelligent and remorseful sorceress, seeking redemption for her past actions. She wears an enchanted robe and carries a magical staff.
